ID: 17589
Title: When the column is binary/varbinary/blob type, the result of `hex` is wrong
Description:
## Bug Report

Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

### 1. Minimal reproduce step (Required)

```
CREATE TABLE t(i int primary key auto_increment, a binary, b binary(0), c binary(20), d binary(255)) character set utf8mb4 collate utf8mb4_general_ci;
mysql> insert into t(a, b, c, d) values (NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into t(a, b, c, d) values ('', '', '', '');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into t(a, b, c, d) values ('a', '', 'a ', 'a ');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into t(a, b, c, d) values ('a', NULL, 'a','a');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into t(a, b, c, d) values (NULL, '', 'a\t', 'a\t');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into t(a, b, c, d) values ('', NULL, ' a', ' a');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into t(a, b, c, d) values ('a', '', '\ta', '\ta');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.01 sec)
mysql> select i, hex(a), hex(b), hex(c), hex(d) from t;
+---+----------------+----------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| i | hex(a)         | hex(b)         | hex(c)                                                                             | hex(d)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
+---+----------------+----------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1 | 0x             | 0x             | 0x                                                                                 | 0x                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| 2 | 0x3030         | 0x             | 0x30303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030 |  |
| 3 | 0x3631         | 0x             | 0x36313230303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030 |  |
| 4 | 0x3631         | 0x             | 0x36313030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030 |  |
| 5 | 0x             | 0x             | 0x36313039303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030 |  |
| 6 | 0x3030         | 0x             | 0x32303631303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030 |  |
| 7 | 0x3631         | 0x             | 0x30393631303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030303030 |  |
+---+----------------+----------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
7 rows in set (0.00 sec)
```
